It can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":35267,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カードの切り所か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Time to play our card...\""},{"lineNumber":35268,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ、そう簡単にこじあけられるかよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah, do you think you can just break through that easily!"},{"lineNumber":35269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大人しく――――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just quietly—"},{"lineNumber":35270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………なんだ、っ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What the...?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初から、長期戦を行う力はありませんでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From the start, we didn't have the strength to fight a prolonged battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「残念ですが……総統。撤退の号令を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's unfortunate... Supreme Commander, order a retreat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぐぬぬぬぬ…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, grrrrrrr..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、ここまで来れれば充分だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enough, it's enough that we've come this far.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍隊は引き上げさせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Withdraw the troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あとは俺たちだけでケイブリスを探して殺す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From here on, we'll search for and kill Cave Bliss ourselves!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待ってください、それは現実的では……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please wait, that's not realistic...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの場所も分からないのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't even know where Cave Bliss is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目だ！　美樹ちゃんは絶対に取り戻す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No! We absolutely will take back Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選りすぐりのメンバーで、突撃を……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a handpicked team, we'll launch an assault...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んがっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh!?"
"Guh... y-you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………すまねぇなぁ、大将。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Sorry, General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ、あんたに死なれるわけにはいかん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't let you die just yet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど加減無しの一撃を後頭部にお見舞いして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Delivering a nearly full-force blow to the back of the head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンがぼやいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton muttered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パットンさん……すみません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Patton-san... I'm sorry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撤退だ。善後策も練らなきゃならん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Retreat. We also have to prepare follow-up measures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何より……ここから脱出するだけでも一大事だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Above all... just escaping from here will be a major ordeal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに、そうですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, that's true..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全軍に伝令！　撤退です！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Message to all troops! It's a retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各方面軍、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To all direction armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮者は所定の手筈で実行に移ってください！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commanders, please proceed with the predetermined arrangements!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の攻勢は途絶え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human offensive came to a halt,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 境界の向こうへの撤退を余儀なくされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they were forced to retreat beyond the border.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦端が開かれてから、二週間――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It had been two weeks since hostilities began—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍と魔軍の戦いは、熾烈を極めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle between the human army and the demon army was fierce to the extreme.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 交代要員は居らず、全軍が二週間の間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With no reinforcements available, the entire army fought for two weeks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 質と数とで上回る相手にほぼ戦い詰め。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: almost continuously against an enemy superior in quality and quantity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 薄氷を踏むような状況を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like walking on thin ice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巧みな用兵で、あるいは卓絶した武勇で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: through skillful tactics and outstanding bravery,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍は幾度もくぐり抜け…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the human army managed to slip through many times...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに今、魔物界の重要拠点のひとつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now, finally, one of the demon realm's important strongholds...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧魔王城を、東西から攻めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Old Demon King's Castle, was being attacked from east and west.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、東口――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the eastern gate—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だめ、堅い……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No good, it's solid...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、魔王城の手前の砦が……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That fortress in front of the Demon King's Castle...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい仕事してるなぁ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're doing a good job...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 即席の砦なのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though it's a makeshift fortress..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦車全てで押し込めれば違うのだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we could push in with all tanks, it'd be different,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道が狭くて一度に通れない、か……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the road is narrow, so they can't pass all at once...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「少数で行くしかないが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have no choice but to go in small numbers...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊の到着まで待つか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Should we wait for the demon hunters to arrive?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やめとけ、増援が近づいてる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't. Reinforcements are approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼んでも、ランス達が来る頃には向こうも倍増だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if we call them, by the time Rance and the others arrive, their side will have doubled."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………うーん。仕方ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmm. It can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カードの切り所か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Time to play our card..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、そう簡単にこじあけられるかよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, do you think you can just break through that easily!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大人しく――――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just quietly—
"...What the...?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初から、長期戦を行う力はありませんでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From the start, we didn't have the strength to fight a prolonged battle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「残念ですが……総統。撤退の号令を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's unfortunate... Supreme Commander, order a retreat."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぐぬぬぬぬ…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Guh, grrrrrrr..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、ここまで来れれば充分だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Enough, it's enough that we've come this far.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍隊は引き上げさせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Withdraw the troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あとは俺たちだけでケイブリスを探して殺す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From here on, we'll search for and kill Cave Bliss ourselves!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待ってください、それは現実的では……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please wait, that's not realistic...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの場所も分からないのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't even know where Cave Bliss is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目だ！　美樹ちゃんは絶対に取り戻す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No! We absolutely will take back Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選りすぐりのメンバーで、突撃を……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a handpicked team, we'll launch an assault...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んがっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh!?"
"Guh... y-you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………すまねぇなぁ、大将。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Sorry, General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ、あんたに死なれるわけにはいかん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't let you die just yet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど加減無しの一撃を後頭部にお見舞いして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Delivering a nearly full-force blow to the back of the head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットンがぼやいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton muttered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パットンさん……すみません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Patton-san... I'm sorry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「撤退だ。善後策も練らなきゃならん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Retreat. We also have to prepare follow-up measures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何より……ここから脱出するだけでも一大事だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Above all... just escaping from here will be a major ordeal."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに、そうですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Indeed, that's true..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全軍に伝令！　撤退です！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Message to all troops! It's a retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各方面軍、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To all direction armies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指揮者は所定の手筈で実行に移ってください！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Commanders, please proceed with the predetermined arrangements!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の攻勢は途絶え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human offensive came to a halt,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 境界の向こうへの撤退を余儀なくされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and they were forced to retreat beyond the border.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦端が開かれてから、二週間――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It had been two weeks since hostilities began—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍と魔軍の戦いは、熾烈を極めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle between the human army and the demon army was fierce to the extreme.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 交代要員は居らず、全軍が二週間の間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With no reinforcements available, the entire army fought for two weeks,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 質と数とで上回る相手にほぼ戦い詰め。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: almost continuously against an enemy superior in quality and quantity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 薄氷を踏むような状況を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like walking on thin ice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巧みな用兵で、あるいは卓絶した武勇で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: through skillful tactics and outstanding bravery,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類軍は幾度もくぐり抜け…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the human army managed to slip through many times...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに今、魔物界の重要拠点のひとつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now, finally, one of the demon realm's important strongholds...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧魔王城を、東西から攻めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Old Demon King's Castle, was being attacked from east and west.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、東口――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the eastern gate—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だめ、堅い……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No good, it's solid...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの、魔王城の手前の砦が……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That fortress in front of the Demon King's Castle...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい仕事してるなぁ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're doing a good job...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 即席の砦なのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though it's a makeshift fortress..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦車全てで押し込めれば違うのだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we could push in with all tanks, it'd be different,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道が狭くて一度に通れない、か……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the road is narrow, so they can't pass all at once...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「少数で行くしかないが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have no choice but to go in small numbers...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人討伐隊の到着まで待つか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Should we wait for the demon hunters to arrive?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やめとけ、増援が近づいてる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't. Reinforcements are approaching.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼んでも、ランス達が来る頃には向こうも倍増だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if we call them, by the time Rance and the others arrive, their side will have doubled."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………うーん。仕方ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Hmm. It can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カードの切り所か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Time to play our card..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、そう簡単にこじあけられるかよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah, do you think you can just break through that easily!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大人しく――――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just quietly—
"...What the...?"
